casebody.data:
METROPOLITAN DEVICE CORPORATION, Appellant, v. BARBER ELECTRIC MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Appellee. No. 172. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 1, 1932. Benjamin T. Rauber and Usina & Rauber, all of New York City, for appellant. O. Ellery Edwards, of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [56 F.(2d) 456] affirmed.
